events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving the wrong product.
The support case has been assigned to agent Sarah L. for handling the refund request.
Hello, this is Sarah from support. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Here is my order number 45321 and attached a clear photo of the wrong item that arrived instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund immediately and arrange a prepaid label for returning the incorrect item.
Thank you for acting quickly. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund has been processed and the return shipping label emailed to you. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to make sure you received your refund and if everything is now satisfactory with your order.
As your refund has been confirmed and no further issues reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
